mapper.sql: ID, PROVINCE_CODE, PROVINCE, LINK, TITLE, AUTHOR, SOURCE, TIME, STATUS, TYPE, IDENT, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into t_info (ID, PROVINCE_CODE, PROVINCE, LINK, TITLE, AUTHOR, SOURCE, TIME, STATUS, TYPE, IDENT, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_TIME, CONTENT, SEND_CONTENT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ident,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sendContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_info
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINK = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
SEND_CONTENT = #{sendContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select ,
from t_info
TIME LIKE '%2017-06%' OR TIME LIKE '%2017年06月%'
mapper.update: update t_info set IDENT = '1' where STATUS='0'
